In-Memory Database Maven Plugin
Last Published: 11 Aug 2011  | Version: 1.1.0
Maven 3 | HSQLDB | Derby | DBUnit

Project Documentation

inmemdb:start

Full name:

com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb:inmemdb-maven-plugin:1.1.0:start

Description:

This plug-in Mojo starts an In Memory Database.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
sources File[] - The source files used to populate the database.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
database String - The database name.
Default value is: ..
password String - The password for database connections.
Default value is: sa.
type String - The database type.
Default value is: hsqldb.
username String - The username for database connections.
Default value is: sa.

Parameter Details

database:

The database name.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${inmemdb.database}
  • Default: .

password:

The password for database connections.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${inmemdb.password}
  • Default: sa

sources:

The source files used to populate the database.
  • Type: java.io.File[]
  • Required: Yes

type:

The database type.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${inmemdb.type}
  • Default: hsqldb

username:

The username for database connections.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${inmemdb.username}
  • Default: sa
